Class ResearchCollection

java.lang.Object
  ResearchCollection

public class ResearchCollection
extends java.lang.Object

A class to hold a collection of programming research papers. The collection is divided into five, programming paradigm, categories.

Version:
v 2.0; 26-11-2015
Author:
Jakub Bachniak

document - title
document - author(s)
document - publisher
document - date published
